issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
1, container completed, and the msg is store in RMAppAttempt.justFinishedContainers
2,  AM allocate and before allocateResponse came to AM, AM crashed
3,  AM restart and couldn't get the container complete msg.
fields.summary: AM may not receive the container complete msg when it restarts

comments.body: put containers in finishedContainersSentToAM back to justFinishedContainer if  AM restart.

yes, this patch ensure AM receive at least one container complete msg, but to one AM process, just receive one.
